USA: Esteban entered Zuni territory and made contact with the Zuni people in the ancient village of Hawikku near nowaday's Zuni Pueblo in New Mexico.
India: Battle of Chausa fought between Humayun and Sher Shah Suri in which Humayun defeated.
Guru Angad Dev becomes second guru of Sikhs.
Colombia: Cacica Gaitana starts the Paezan revolt against the Spanish conquest
Foundation of Neiva by Juan de Cabrera
Foundation of Honda, Tolima by Gonzalo Jiménez de Quesada
Gonzalo Suárez Rendón founded the city of Tunja
Burma: Pegu made capital of Toungoo Kingdom
